### Helper functions

```{r, include=FALSE}
# =============================================================================.
#
# -----------------------------------------------------------------------------.
ParallelDensity <- function(data, k = 100, spacing = 0.2, jitter = "unif") {
  nc <- ncol(data)
  nr <- nrow(data)
  if(jitter == "triangle") {
    j <- rtriangle(nc * nr, a = -1, b = 1, c = 0)
  } else {
    j <- runif(nc * nr, -1, 1)
  }
  j <- j * (1 - spacing) / 2
  x <- rep(1:nc, each = nr)
  r <- 100 * diff(range(data))
  m <- cbind(r * x + j, as.vector(data))
  m <- cbind(m, knn_density(m, k = k))
  m[, 1] <- x + j
  m
}
# =============================================================================.
#
# -----------------------------------------------------------------------------.
PlotParallelDensity <- function(x, k, clr = "ry", spacing = 0.2, grid = T, ...) {

  m <- ParallelDensity(x, k, spacing)
  nc <- ncol(x)
  
  lim <- xylim(m[, 1:2], spacing = c(0, 0))
  empty.plot(xlim = lim$x, ylim = lim$y, axes = F, ...)
  if(grid) grid(nx = 0, ny = NULL)
  axis(2)
  axis(1, at = 1:nc, labels = colnames(x), las = 2, tick = F)
  clr <- colorize(m[, 3], mode = "rank", col = clr)
  clr <- transformColors(clr, S.range = 0.9)
  points(m, cex = 0.5, col = clr)
}
```

### E14_EPZ

EZH2 inhibitor washout experiments in mouse ESCs.

```{r, echo=FALSE, fig.height=3.5, fig.width=3.5}
# =============================================================================.
#
# -----------------------------------------------------------------------------.
data_path <- "/Volumes/USB16GB/LT_WORKS/NextSeq_E14EPZ/_RDATA_/"

ROI.LST <- readRDS(paste0(data_path, "ROI.LST.rdata"))

E14_EPZ.me3 <- readRDS(paste0(data_path, "E14_EPZ_H3K27me3.RData"))
E14_EPZ.me2 <- readRDS(paste0(data_path, "E14_EPZ_H3K27me2_B.RData"))
E14_EPZ.me1 <- readRDS(paste0(data_path, "E14_EPZ_H3K27me1.RData"))
# -----------------------------------------------------------------------------.

# layout(matrix(1:9, 3, 3, byrow = T))
par(mar = c(6, 4, 2, 1), pch = 20, cex.main = 0.9, cex.lab = 0.8, cex.axis = 0.8)

roi <- "WHOLE_GENOME"
ses_alpha <- list()
for(wks_name in c("E14_EPZ.me3", "E14_EPZ.me2", "E14_EPZ.me1")) {
  message(wks_name)
  wks <- get(wks_name)
  
  cnt <- wks$CNT[[roi]]
  chk <- FiniteValues(log2(cnt))
  cnt <- cnt[chk, ]
  ses_alpha[[wks_name]] <- CPSES(cnt, dither = 1)
}

roi <- "CGI_UCSC"
wks_name <- "E14_EPZ.me2"

for(wks_name in c("E14_EPZ.me3", "E14_EPZ.me2", "E14_EPZ.me1")) {
  
  roi <- "CGI_UCSC"
  wks_name <- "E14_EPZ.me2"
  wks_name <- "E14_EPZ.me3"
  
  message(wks_name)
  wks <- get(wks_name)

  cnt <- wks$CNT[[roi]]
  chk <- FiniteValues(log2(cnt))
  cnt <- cnt[chk, ]
  ldc <- log2(DitherCounts(cnt))
  
  brd <- t(t(ldc) + wks$BRD$normfactors)
  
  # ses   <- log2(t(t(2^ldc) * ses_alpha[[wks_name]]))
  
  crx <- wks$ann$mapped.nbr.dm3
  crx <-  log2(mean(crx) / crx)
  crx <- t(t(ldc) + crx)
    
  PlotParallelDensity(crx, k = 100, ylab = "log2(counts)", main = "spike-in")
  PlotParallelDensity(brd, k = 100, ylab = "log2(counts)", main = "BRD")
  # PlotParallelDensity(ses, k = 100, ylab = "log2(counts)", main = "CPSES")
  empty.plot(axes = F)
}

```


### ESC_BRD

SUZ12 WT + KO cell mix experiments in mouse ESCs.

```{r, eval=FALSE, include=FALSE}
# =============================================================================.
#
# -----------------------------------------------------------------------------.
data_path <- "/Volumes/USB16GB/LT_WORKS/NextSeq_ESC_BRD_RDATA/"

ESC_BRD.H3K27me3 <- readRDS(paste0(data_path, "ESC_BRD_H3K27me3.RData"))
ESC_BRD.Suz12    <- readRDS(paste0(data_path, "ESC_BRD_Suz12.RData"))
# -----------------------------------------------------------------------------.
# layout(matrix(1:9, 3, 3, byrow = T))
par(mar = c(6, 4, 2, 1), pch = 20, cex.main = 0.9, cex.lab = 0.8, cex.axis = 0.8)

roi <- "CGI_UCSC"

for(wks_name in c("ESC_BRD.Suz12", "ESC_BRD.H3K27me3")) {
  
  message(wks_name)
  wks <- get(wks_name)

  cnt <- wks$CNT[[roi]]
  chk <- FiniteValues(log2(cnt))
  cnt <- cnt[chk, ]
  ldc <- log2(DitherCounts(cnt))
  
  brd <- t(t(ldc) + wks$BRD$normfactors)

  PlotParallelDensity(brd, k = 100, ylab = "log2(counts)", main = "BRD")
}
```

### Lu_et_al

H3WT versus K36M experiments from Lu et al., 2016.

```{r, eval=FALSE, include=FALSE}
# =============================================================================.
#
# -----------------------------------------------------------------------------.
data_path <- "/Volumes/USB16GB/LT_WORKS/GSE63195_Lu_et_al_2016/_RDATA_/"
ROI.LST <- readRDS(paste0(data_path, "ROI.LST.rdata"))

Lu_et_al <- readRDS(paste0(data_path, "Lu_et_al_H3K36me3.RData"))
# -----------------------------------------------------------------------------.
# layout(matrix(1:9, 3, 3, byrow = T))
par(mar = c(6, 4, 2, 1), pch = 20, cex.main = 0.9, cex.lab = 0.8, cex.axis = 0.8)

wks <- Lu_et_al
xps <- with(wks, match(experiments, ann$lt_id))

ovl <- with(ROI.LST, countOverlaps(WHOLE_GENOME, GN, type = "within"))
ovl <- which(ovl > 0)
ovl <- sample(ovl, size = 50000)

cnt <- wks$CNT$WHOLE_GENOME[ovl, ]
chk <- FiniteValues(log2(cnt))
cnt <- log2(DitherCounts(cnt[chk, ]))

brd <- t(t(cnt) + wks$BRD$scaling)

PlotParallelDensity(brd[grepl()], k = 100, ylab = "log2(counts)", main = "BRD")
```
